full_summary:
### Senior Psychologist Service for Offenders in Pacific Region - Request for Proposal (RFP)
#### Solicitation # : 21807-22-0084
#### Solicited By : Correctional Service of Canada, Griffiths-McKay Health Services
#### Issued on : 2023-02-01
#### Closing Date : 2023-02-21 17:00:00

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) seeks a senior psychologist to provide psychological assessment, treatment, and/or supervisory services to offenders in the Pacific Region. The successful proponent must have expertise in mental health and/or psychological assessment and risk assessment.

### Objectives

- Provide essential and non-essential mental health and/or psychological assessment services to offenders as requested by the CSC Project Authority.
- Collaborate with the interdisciplinary health services team, including nursing, psychology, social work, occupational therapy, and other allied healthcare professionals.
- Prepare and submit psychological assessments and other reports as requested by the CSC Project Authority.

### Deliverables

- Provide psychological assessment services to CSC offenders.
- Perform and submit psychological risk assessment reports to CSC Project Authority and designates.
- Participate in meetings as a consultant, including case conferences, the Interdisciplinary Mental Health Team, and other related activities.

### Eligibility Criteria

- The proponent must be a practicing psychologist with a master's or doctoral degree in psychology.
- The proponent must have at least 5 years of experience in mental health and/or psychological assessment services.
- The proponent must be registered and licensed to practice as a psychologist in the Province of British Columbia.

### Evaluation Criteria

- Technical proposal 70%
- Past performance 20%
- Business plan 10%

### Contract Duration

- The contract will be for a term of up to 4 years, with an option to extend for another 1 year.
- The successful proponent will be responsible for providing services to CSC offenders, as requested by the CSC Project Authority.

### Point of Contact

- Carmen Skolos, Griffiths-McKay Health Services - Phone (604) 870-2521, Email [carmen.skolos@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:carmen.skolos@csc-scc.gc.ca)

### Requirements

- The successful proponent must have proficiency in the English language.
- The successful proponent must be willing to participate in security clearances check.

### Additional Informations

- The CSC reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
